attributes.action: Immense regulation, tax & climate policy change to incentivise industry.
attributes.additional_details:
These changes are essential for Britains almost decimated industrial capacity. 

I hate the idea that I can't buy steels, plastics & many other types of components/raw resources. That haven't been exclusively produced in the UK from, mining the coal, iron and limestone to the machines inside the rolling mills in our steel mills.

We were once the forefront of manufacturing and innovation. We need radical policy change to restore our industry, so Britian can be industrial hub of the world again.
attributes.background:
I want the government to make a new industrial strategy to revitalise British Industry.

By massive incentive into manufacturing industry like: Petrochemicals, mining, steel production & semiconductors.
Providing change to climate policy, taxes, regulation & planning changes. & providing grants.

rejection.details:
We are not clear what action you are seeking.

You can start a new petition setting out more clearly what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
